title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Changing joystick sensitivity - trim wheel
description:
Probably you have also been hit by this issue when trying to use the trim wheel on your joystick: you stalled. In this video we will look at how you can change the sensitivity of the trim wheel on your joystick so it becomes a lot more useful when using it in MSFS 2020.
